intro: Wellstedia socotrana, commonly known as Socotra's starflower, is a unique flowering plant native to the island of Socotra. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in arid and rocky environments, showcasing its adaptation to the harsh climate of Socotra. Its leaves are narrow and succulent, helping to conserve water in its native habitat. Wellstedia socotrana is a rare species, reflecting the island's distinct flora and ecological significance.
